fullreview.headline: Chillin' in my Chinos
fullreview.comments: These chinos are so comfortable. I love just layin' around the house in these pants.

fullreview.headline: Best PS3 Bundle Out There
fullreview.comments: This is the best plaustation 3 bundle I have seen online. Comes with 4 games that will leave you with hours of fun. The set up of the PS3 is easy and the blu-Ray player is awesome for High-Definition viewing.

fullreview.headline: This is the camera you want
fullreview.comments: I love this camera, I have had it for a month now and can not put it down. All the features of this camera are easy to use and very powerful. The software is easy to install and even easier to use. Picture quality is second to none as far as I can tell.

fullreview.headline: Too stressful
fullreview.comments: This distressed shirt stresses me out with its fake worn out look. I want a shirt that shows "real" wear.

fullreview.headline: Great player - The classic !
fullreview.comments: iPod classic in white is a good old standard. In this shop at a good price. I used it as a gift several times.

fullreview.headline: Good Shoe
fullreview.comments: Really liked this shoe. Was delivered as shown on the website. Great fit and good quality.

fullreview.headline: Play Golf in the rain
fullreview.comments: Got this as a father's day gift and I love it. It is very large. I use this while golfing but also as an everyday umbrella.

fullreview.headline: great tv
fullreview.comments: great tv, bought it just a few days ago and love it!

fullreview.headline: Great for my wild side
fullreview.comments: When I go out trapping bears I always bring my faux fur hat. The animals don't see me as much of a threat when I wear faux fur and it shows that I am sensitive to my environment.

fullreview.headline: Good fit vest
fullreview.comments: Nice vest, keeps you warm outside.

fullreview.headline: Keeps me warm on the slopes
fullreview.comments: I wear this skiing when it is warm out. I really like the fabric and the burnt amber color screams out that I know fashion.

fullreview.headline: Never worry about getting lost again
fullreview.comments: I use the Tom Tom everywhere I go when on the road. The multiple features are very easy to use and informative. I am able to find restaurants and other landmarks easily when traveling on business.

fullreview.headline: Not just for women
fullreview.comments: I know these boots say "women's", but I have petite feet and these just fit better than any other boot out there.

customerimage.caption: Putting the boots to the test

fullreview.headline: Shoe as present
fullreview.comments: Used this shoe as a present for my girlfriend. She normally has 6" shoes but this one was too large.

fullreview.headline: Look great fits terribly
fullreview.comments: I bought these for my fiance a month ago and we had to return them twice as neither the narrow nor the wide fit her. The boots themselves look great but I would recommend trying them on in a store first before purchasing.

fullreview.headline: Nice colors
fullreview.comments: Nice sweater I bought two different colors. Looks good at work.

fullreview.headline: Look out Steve Jobs!
fullreview.comments: If Steve Jobs thinks his black St. Croix mock turtleneck is great, wait til he sees me in this. He is going to be envious of the style and good looks this mock brings when I am out cruising around Cupertino.

fullreview.headline: Khaki is the bomb!
fullreview.comments: This cargo jacket is phenomenal! The fabric is the best you can buy for the money and the khaki color is irresistible. I can't be any cooler in this jacket.

customerimage.caption: Me looking cool in my jacket.

fullreview.headline: Good looking and warm
fullreview.comments: Great jacket, great design and can be combined with several other styles. Keeps warm in winter.

fullreview.headline: Great winter jacket
fullreview.comments: This jacket provides me with the ablity to have a nice warm winter jacket for those cold New England days as well as a lightweight jacket for the spring without having to purchase separate jackets. Great price as well.

taggroup.name: Cons
taggroup.tag: Hard to play at the end

fullreview.headline: Kids love it

taggroup.name: Cons
taggroup.tag: Hard to play at the end

fullreview.comments: I bought this for my kids. Nice game they love it. I tried it myself and it fun to play. After a while the kids get better but the game is to complicated for them in higher levels.

fullreview.headline: Nice bag but a bit overpriced
fullreview.comments: I bought this a week ago and have been pleased with overall use I have got out of the product. The price is a bit high in my opinion. I use this for a work bag carrying my laptop and other files and it works fine.

fullreview.headline: This TV knocks me right off the couch!
fullreview.comments: I love this TV! I traded in my 13" B&W for this model and I am blown away. The blacks are really black and I feel like I am in a movie theater. I can't figure out the remote though so I have been stuck watching old movies on Encore since I can't seem to change the channel.

fullreview.headline: Amazing Product
fullreview.comments: I bought this TV 3 weeks ago and I am blown away by the clarity of the picture for TV, Movies and Video Games. Easy to connect to Verizon Fios as well as my Sony Playstation 3. Lightweight so it is easy to pick up and move if redecorating.

fullreview.headline: Good Picture, reasonable sound
fullreview.comments: Good TV with great possibilities to connect additional players and notebook. The remote control is rather complicated to handle.

fullreview.headline: Looks great in the pilot's lounge
fullreview.comments: I look great in my Cessna with this jacket on. Nobody is cooler than me when I wear this.
